data.message: Well I used to like before you starting spewing hate and pushing your political agenda! Now no more Eminem for me although I know you won't miss me I hope you know you have fans you have let down extremely

replies.message: Your arrogance is way too funny 💀💀

i don't understand, so when Em disses celebrities it's okay, when he dissed Bush it's okay, when he dissed trump it's not okay? i mean Em been like that forever, okay maybe it was overdone when de drew the line but man it aint no reason to stop listening to you are a fan,
Jadssam Parra no arrogance hence why i said he won't miss me dumbass
Chelsea Dawn Smith-Thetford you completely ignored his point, arrogant twat
Why? Because he won't be racist with you?
He told Trump supports to F* off. So goodbye! Dislike the pages lol
Andre Moore sure that's your scapegoat all white people who voted for trump are racists that is ignorant
Sean Roeller so you want to listen to his music to hear his political option? Just like I bet you watch the NFL to see players protest? 🙄

I hope he raps killing trump like he did with bush. So people like you can piss off no one cares about you being butt hurt about him dissing our president. 

Our president is a piece of shit.
Hunter Fogleman just like no one cares about you crying he is our president you cute lil snowflake
